error.message: Call to deprecated function drush_drupal_version(): See \Drush\Boot\Boot::getVersion.
Call to deprecated function drush_drupal_version(): See \Drush\Boot\Boot::getVersion.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to nettybot.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
